step1.save-your-password: Save all your passwords, data or any information here, forget about paper notes and protected apps.
step1.create_your_master_pass: Create your master key: only you can access your secrets with it.
step1.in_the_first_position: First, you need to create a different password for your electronic belongings. You wonâ€™t be able to recover your password, so remember it well.
step1.for_example: For example, your target number, the PIN and PUK of your mobile phone, the serial number of any of your devices, or any information you need to keep safe.
step1.to_continue: In order to continue, you must confirm that you are over 18 years of age and that you agree to our processing of your data in accordance with our privacy policies.

step2.Clue_of_password: Password Track (Add a word or phrase to remember your password)
step2.alert_password_rules: Password must be between 8 and 24 characters, a uppercase and a number to continue
step2.alert_equal_password: Password is not the same as the previous one
